item.title: What She Really Wants For Christmas
item.dc:creator: Nicola Bonn
item.category: A Survival Guide For The Modern Man
item.description:
Right. Christmas is less than a month away and it’s time to focus. Let’s make this year you buy the woman in your life a gift that is going to make her so happy that she’s like a kid on Christmas morning. If you want to buy the perfect present but have no idea where […]

item.title: Meghan Markle and Breaking The Mould
item.dc:creator: Nicola Bonn
item.category: A Survival Guide For The Modern Man
item.description:
I got a text from my Mum last night. “They’re finally engaged”. “Who?” I asked. Thinking that she was perhaps referring to my cousin and his girlfriend. “Harry and Meghan of course”. I love my Mum. She can’t resist a good old royal romance and neither can the majority of us if the newspapers and […]

The post Meghan Markle and Breaking The Mould appeared first on Nicola Bonn.

item.title: Sex On The First Date
item.dc:creator: Nicola Bonn
item.category: A Survival Guide For The Modern Man
item.description:
I can’t even count the amount of times that I’ve heard men tell me that if a woman sleeps with them on the first date then she isn’t relationship material. The general consensus seems to be that if a woman makes you wait she’s more likely a “keeper” than if she “puts out” too quickly. […]

Continue Reading...

The post Sex On The First Date appeared first on Nicola Bonn.

item.title: Workplace Etiquette
item.dc:creator: Nicola Bonn
item.category: A Survival Guide For The Modern Man
item.description:
I feel really sorry for many male colleagues at the moment. Since the Harvey Weinstein story broke, the news has been laden with story after story about men who have misbehaved in the workplace. Actually, misbehaved is an understatement. Many of these men have groped/raped and bullied and it is only now that the conversation […]

item.title: The Two Week Online Dating Challenge
item.dc:creator: Nicola Bonn
item.category: A Survival Guide For The Modern Man
item.description:
So many of the men that I talk to complain about online dating. Take my cab driver Neil. Lovely guy, very witty, a heart of gold but a total failure at the online dating game. “I just can’t meet the right woman”, he complains. “None of the ones that I show interest in reciprocate and […]
